_header: Phebus found first the craft of medicine
_description: How to obtain good health: Phebus’ and Esculapius’ doctrines on ‘temperat diete’ — one stanza rhyme royal

HunHU1051.Transcription:
Phebus fonde first the craft of medecineBy touche of poves &
                    vryne inspectionsEsculapius taght the doctryneTo know the qualites of
                    the iiij compliccions
